compatibility.notes: YPL-1.1 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: You must have the authority to bind your corporation or entity to this Agreement if acting on their behalf.
You must clearly indicate any differing license terms when distributing in compiled format.
license.name: YPL-1.1
obligations: Include a complete copy of the YPL with any distribution of the Software or Modifications.
Distribute Modifications in source code format under the same terms as the YPL.
Provide access to the source code when distributing in compiled or object code format.
